thread.title: Southern California braces for second round of mudslides

title: Southern California braces for second round of mudslides
text:
Southern California braces for second round of mudslides 5:12pm GMT - 00:48 
Just two months after mudslides devastated areas of southern California, residents are evacuating once again as a storm rolls through the area. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Just two months after mudslides devastated areas of southern California, residents are evacuating once again as a storm rolls through the area. Colette Luke has more. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IJ7UcL
